function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited studies on respiratory infection control through FM activities","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive research on FM activities for infection control, expanding the scope of covered FM activities","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UVGI technology","People":"Occupants of buildings, facility managers, policymakers","Owner":"Industry experts, academic researchers, environmental health policymakers"},{"Description":"Gaps in FM activities that contribute to infection control","Impact":"Inadequate measures for infection control in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Researching and implementing additional FM activities for infection control, integrating various FM interventions","Technologies":"Integrated building management systems, advanced disinfection technologies","People":"Occupants of buildings, facility managers","Owner":"Academic researchers, industry experts, facility managers"}]}
